#Text=Polish PM Beata
#Text=Szydło welcomes US troops
#Text=Monday , January 16 , 2017
#Text=Polish
#Text=Prime Minister Beata Szydło on Saturday headed a ceremony in the Western town of Żagań welcoming US troops .
#Text=The troops are in the region in response to Russian action in Ukraine and began arriving earlier this week .
#Text=Szydło from file .
#Text=Image : Chancellery of the Prime Minister of Poland .
#Text=" Each Polish family must feel safe " , Szydło said .
#Text="

#Text= We have waited for you for a very long time , " he told the troops .

column1: #Text=" We waited for decades , sometimes feeling we had been left alone , sometimes almost losing hope , sometimes feeling that we were the only one who protected civilization from aggression that came from the east .

#Text=Russian Deputy Foreign Minister Alexei Mechkov said the incoming troops and vehicles were a  factor destabilising European security " .

column1: #Text=The presence of US assets " threatens our interests and our security , " according to Russian President Vladimir Putin .
#Text=Putin 's administration described the deployment as " a threat " .
#Text=Polish relations with Russia are strained .
#Text=Since the annexation of Crimea , Russia has recently been increasing its military presence in Kalingrad .
#Text=The enclave , Russian territory lying between Poland and Lithuania , now has nuclear -capable Iskander missiles and anti-ship Bastion equipment .
#Text=US – Russian relations are also strained .
#Text=Last month the US expelled 35 Russian diplomats accused of espionage , and sanctioned Russian intelligence agencies .
#Text=This was in response to a CIA report issued two weeks earlier that concluded the Russian government hacked servers belonging to the U.S. Republican and Democratic parties .
#Text=The CIA report said this was to turn the 2016 presidential election toward president-elect Donald Trump .
#Text=Trump has indicated he seeks closer ties with Russia .
#Text=He takes power this month .
#Text="

column3:
_	_	_	_

#Text=This is America 's most capable fighting force : A combat-ready , highly trained US armoured brigade , with our most advanced equipment and weaponry ,  according to Paul James , US ambassador to Poland .

#Text=James , who attended the ceremony , said the troops represent  America 's iron-clad commitment to honor our NATO treaty obligation to defend our NATO allies .

_	_	_	_

#Text=In a Wall Street Journal interview published on Friday Trump indicated he wishes to maintain sanctions against Russia  at least for a period of time , " but ultimately remove them as relations improve .

column1: #Text=" If you get along and if Russia is really helping us , why would anybody have sanctions if somebody ’s doing some really great things ?

#Text=Outgoing CIA director John Brennan said yesterday Trump  does n't understand Russia " and expressed concerns the US President-Elect 's spontaneity would damage US national security .

column1: #Text=A total of around 4,000 troops are pledged to the region .
